verses.verse: Since for sure it is true that many attempted to again arrange a description about the items that have been well-established among us,
just as the eyewitnesses from the beginning turned it over to us after they also became rowers of the message,
it also seemed good to me, who has followed alongside everything from the top, to accurately write to you in order, most powerful Theophilus,
so that you might correctly understand about the certainty of the messages that echoed down to you.
It happened in the days of Herod, the king of Judea; a certain priest with the name Zacharias from the Abijah priest rotation and his wife from the daughters of Aaron (and her name was Elisabeth),
both were doing what was right in the sight of God, traveling in all the demands and right paths of the Master, faultless people.
And there was no child with them due to the fact that Elisabeth was infertile and both were people who were advanced in years (literally, had walked on in their days).
It happened during the time for him to be performing the priest duties in the arrangement of his priest rotation directly in front of God
in line with the custom of the priest's office; he took his turn of the "to burn incense after going into the temple of the Master" kind.
And there was the entire large number of the group praying outside at the hour of the incense.
An angel of the Master was seen by him that had stood at places to the right of the incense altar.
And Zacharias was uneasy when he saw him and fear fell on him.
The angel said to him, "Don't be afraid, Zacharias, because your plea was listened to, your wife Elisabeth will give birth to a son for you, and you will call his name John.
And happiness and excitement will be with you. And many will be happy based on his birth.
You see, he will be huge in the sight of the Master. And he should not in any way drink wine and alcohol, he will be filled with the Sacred Spirit (still from his mother's belly),
he will turn many of the sons of Israel back to the Master, their God,

and he will go on ahead in His sight in Elijah's spirit and ability to turn back hearts of fathers to children, and to turn back unbelieving people in the focus of people who do what is right, to get an ethnic group ready that has been designed for the Master."
And Zacharias said to the angel, "How will I know this is true? You see, I am an old man, and my wife is a woman that is advanced in years (literally, has walked on in her days)."

And when the angel answered, he said to him, "I am Gabriel, the one who has stood by in the sight of God. And I was sent out on a mission to speak to you and to share the good news of these things with you.
And look, you will be silent and not able to speak till the day that these things happen for the times that you did not trust my words, some that will be accomplished in their appointed time."
And the group was expecting Zacharias and were amazed during the time for him to be taking a long time in the temple.

When he came out, he was not able to speak to them. And they correctly understood that he has seen a sighting in the temple. And he was gesturing throughout to them and through it all staying speech-impaired.
And it happened as soon as the days of his ministry culminated; he went off to his house.
After these days, Elisabeth, his wife, conceived and hid herself from everyone for five months, saying,
"Because this is what the Master has done to me in days that He looked on me to take away the insult of me among people."
During the month, the sixth, the angel Gabriel was sent out from God on a mission to a city of Galilee to which belongs the name Nazareth
to a virgin that had been engaged to a man to whom belongs the name Joseph from David's house. And the name of the virgin was Mary.
And when the angel went into a house to her, he said, "Be happy, you who have been shown generosity. The Master is with you, you who have been conferred with prosperity among women."
When the virgin saw him, she was very upset over his message and was thoroughly considering what kind of greeting this might be.
And the angel said to her, "Don't be afraid, Mary. You see, you found generosity beside God.
And look, you will conceive in your womb and will deliver a son. And you will call His name Jesus.
This son will be huge and will be called Son of the Highest. And the Master, God, will give Him the throne of David, His father.
And He will be king over the house of Jacob for the spans of time, and of His empire there will not be a conclusion."
Mary said to the angel, "How will this be since I do not know a man?"

And when the angel answered, he said to her, "The Sacred Spirit will come on you, and the shadow of the ability of the Highest will fall on you. For this reason, the sacred Child being born from you also will be called Son of God.
And look, Elisabeth, your relative, she has also conceived a son in her agedness. And this is the sixth month for her, the one who is called infertile,
because every statement beside God will not be impossible."
Mary said, "Look, the slave of the Master. May it happen to me in line with your statement." And the angel went away from her.
When Mary got up in those days, she traveled to the mountainous area in a hurry, into a city of Judah.
And she went into Zacharias' house and greeted Elisabeth.
And it happened as Elisabeth heard the greeting of Mary; the baby skipped in her belly, and Elisabeth was filled with the Sacred Spirit.
And she hollered loudly with a loud voice and said, "You (who have been conferred with prosperity among women) and the fruit of your belly (that has been conferred with prosperity),
and where does this come to me from, that the mother of my Master would come to me?
You see, look, as the voice of your greeting became in my ears, the baby skipped with excitement in my belly.
And the woman who trusted is blessed because there will be a finished result to the things that have been spoken to her from the side of the Master."
And Mary said, "My soul makes the Master huge.
And my spirit is excited based on God, my Rescuer,
because He took a look at the lowness of His slave. You see, look, from the present on all the generations will consider me to be blessed
because the Competent One did great things for me and His name is sacred.
And His forgiving kindness is for generations of generations to the people who fear Him.
He made power with His arm. He dispersed proud people with a mind of their heart.
He took competent rulers down from thrones and put lowly people up high.
He filled up people who were hungry with good and sent people who were rich off empty.
He assisted His servant boy Israel to be remembered for forgiving kindness,
just as He spoke to our fathers (to Abraham and his seed) for the span of time."
Mary stayed together with her as if it were three months and returned to her house.
For Elisabeth, the time of the "for her to deliver" part culminated, and she gave birth to a son.
And the houses around there and her relatives heard that the Master was making His forgiving kindness huge with her, and they were happy together with her.
And it happened during the eighth day; they came to circumcise the young child, and they were calling him based on the name of his father Zacharias.
And when his mother responded, she said, "Definitely not, but he will be called John."
And they said to her, "There is no one among your relatives who is called by this name."
They were gesturing at his father the "what he would want him to be called" thing.
And after he asked for a writing pad, he wrote, saying, "John is his name." And everyone was amazed.
At once his mouth and his tongue were opened, and he was speaking, conferring prosperity on God.
And fear became on everyone housed around them. And in the whole mountainous area of Judea all these statements were spoken through there.
And everyone who heard placed it in their heart, saying, "What kind of young child will this be then?" And the Master's hand was with him.
And Zacharias, his father, was filled with the Sacred Spirit and preached, saying,
"The Master, the God of Israel, is conferred with prosperity because He kept an eye on and made the release payment for His ethnic group.
And He raised up a horn of rescue for us in the house of David, His servant boy,
just as He spoke through the mouth of His preachers, the sacred ones, since the span of time began,
a rescue from our enemies and from the hand of all the people who hate us,
to show forgiving kindness with our fathers and to remember His sacred treaty,
an oath that He guaranteed to Abraham, our father,
for the purpose to give to us, after we were saved from the hand of our enemies, to be ministering to Him fearlessly
in holiness and the right way in His sight all the days of our life.
And you, young child, will be called a preacher of the Highest. You see, you will travel ahead before the face of the Master to get His way ready,
for the purpose to give information about rescue to His ethnic group in forgiveness of their sins,
because of our God's sympathy of forgiving kindness in which a rising from a high position will keep an eye on us
to shine on the people sitting in darkness and a shadow of death for the purpose to direct our feet to a road of peace."
The young child was growing and gaining power in the spirit. And he was in the backcountry until the day of his public showing to Israel.
